metadata.title: CVE-2023-32763 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Qt before 5.15.15, 6.x before 6.2.9, and 6.3.xthrough 6.5.x before 6.5.1. When a SVG file with an image inside it isrendered, a QTextLayout buffer overflow can be triggered.

criterions.comment: qtbase-opensource-src package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
qtbase-opensource-src-gles package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
